title: Jihn Bug With Reload
body: Sometimes when you kill an enemy champion before your bullets run out, you cannot cast any abilities until the gun is reloaded again!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! Please report PBE issues on the [PBE boards](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create). It better helps us track issues on live versus on PBE!

Thanks! ^-^
There is no option to put Jihn's name in the champion box!
